channel.title: My journal on matias silva
channel.description: Recent content in My journal on matias silva

item.title: Applying to Cambridge?
item.description: I often get asked about where I go to university and when I reply, this usually elicits faces of surprise, excitement, or in some cases shock. It’s a curious topic for many, and I can’t blame them for it! I would’ve equally wanted to know more about applying in my younger days too. Over the years, people have approached me for advice and what I did to “get in”. I’ve collected a few of these replies and put them in this post, in the hopes that it may one day help someone!
